name: Hometown Zombies VR for Google Cardboard
name_original: Hometown Zombies VR for Google Cardboard
description:
Have you experienced the Zombies in real life? Because if you are seeing this you are on right place to experience Zombies, Monsters and The walking dead.

The experience just doesn't stop here. We have brought to you a complete game to play with zombies, Let's kill them, let's destroy them. Focus on the zombie with laser assisted gun target them on head otherwise they are gonna come and grab you and they will bite you till death.

Let's have fun.

Don't forget to leave a feedback at m.nadeemunawar@gmail.com
